EmailTemplate.description: template used for Support to send emails to customers that a Dealer Issue is resolved
EmailTemplate.name: !!!Rachel - Dealer Issue Resolved Notification - Rachel
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber} -VinSolutions has resolved your issue
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}
Previously you contacted us reporting an Error:
"Global Taxes - CT - When the modified taxable base for a deal in Connecticut is >= $50,000.00, a different tax rate needs to be applied."
This issue has been resolved, and this ticket is now closed.
As always, please do reach out to our support team with any additional questions or concerns regarding this case.
Sincerely,
VinSolutions Support Team
SupportTeam@vinsolutions.com
1.800.980.7488 option 1
